actions: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. *Hit:* 4 (ld4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.
name: Giant Centipede
